context.p: Plugins installed for Serna are located in the sernaInstallationPath\plugins directory or in an additional plugins directory.
You can see the list of all the available plugins and disable/enable them for all document types:

info.p: To call up the Preferences Dialog, choose Tools Preferences .

In the Installed plugins column, you can see the names of available plugins. In the SPD Path column, you can see the paths to their *.spd files (Serna plugin description files). Checked plugins are enabled.

step.cmd: To enable/disable a plugin, check/uncheck the <PLUGIN NAME> checkbox.
Click the Apply button to apply the settings.
Click the Close button to close the dialog.
